Author: zach
Content: Randall, we're not too old, although hanging around here may give you that impression.  YC focuses on younger founders because they're undervalued, not necessarily more plentiful or successful in absolute terms.

Title: Software blamed for BlackBerry service crash

Author: willarson
Content: His point about cross-polination of fields leading to innovation is also made extensively by Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi in his two books "Flow" and "Creativity". I'd highly recommend them to anyone who is interested in the process of creativity (he looks at it in a number of different fields), or who is interested in human behavior (especially one's own).
